alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued July 09 at 7:46PM MST until July 09 at 8:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A DUST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM MST FOR MARICOPA AND PINAL COUNTIES... At 746 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from Eloy to near Casa Grande to 8 miles west of Blackwater to Seville, moving west at 30 mph. HAZARD...Less than a mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 163 and 204. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 165 and 178. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 124 and 165. Locations impacted include... Mesa, Chandler, Gilbert, Casa Grande, Florence, Coolidge, Sun Lakes, Maricopa, Queen Creek, Arizona City, La Palma, San Tan Village Mall, San Tan Valley, Seville and Bapchule. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake. Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
